Title(s): ‘My love is to the grenewode gone’
_description: ‘My love is to the grenewode gone’ — five lines

BLAdd31922.Transcription: Trolly lolly loly losyng troly loly lomy loue is to the grene wode gonenow after wyll I gosyng trolly loly lo lo ly lo
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated for two more singing parts.
